text: Never Been Kissed is a 1999 American comedy movie directed by Raja Gosnell. It follows a journalist pretending to be high school student. It stars Drew Barrymore, David Arquette, Michael Vartan, Molly Shannon, Leelee Sobieski, John C. Reilly, Jessica Alba, Marley Shelton and Garry Marshall. It marked the first movie produced by Flower Films and James Franco's film debut. == Other websites == * == References == Category:1990s high school movies Category:1999 romantic comedy movies Category:1990s teen comedy movies Category:1990s teen romance movies Category:American high school movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Raja Gosnell Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Proms in movies
title: Never Been Kissed
